chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
f: A -> nat

Goal:
forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 : btree A), build l1 t1 -> build l2 t2 -> weight_tree_list f l1 = weight_tree_list f l2 -> same_sum_leaves f l1 l2 -> weight_tree f t1 = weight_tree f t2

Premises:
weight_tree_list : forall A : Type, (A -> nat) -> list (btree A) -> nat
Inductive build : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := build_one : forall t : btree A, build [t] t | build_step : forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), one_step f l1 l2 -> build l2 t -> build l1 t Arguments build _%list_scope Arguments build_step _ (_ _)%list_scope
weight_tree : forall A : Type, (A -> nat) -> btree A -> nat
same_sum_leaves : forall A : Type, (A -> nat) -> list (btree A) -> list (btree A) -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
one_step_comp : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list (btree A)), weight_tree_list f l1 = weight_tree_list f l2 -> same_sum_leaves f l1 l2 -> one_step f l1 l3 -> one_step f l2 l4 -> weight_tree_list f l3 = weight_tree_list f l4 /\ same_sum_leaves f l3 l4
one_step_weight_tree_list : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l1 l2 l3 : list (btree A)), one_step f l1 l2 -> one_step f l1 l3 -> weight_tree_list f l2 = weight_tree_list f l3
weight_tree_list_permutation : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), permutation l1 l2 -> weight_tree_list f l1 = weight_tree_list f l2
weight_tree_list_node : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), weight_tree_list f (node t1 t2 :: l) = sum_leaves f t1 + sum_leaves f t2 + weight_tree_list f (t1 :: t2 :: l)
build_step : forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), one_step f l1 l2 -> build l2 t -> build l1 t
one_step_same_sum_leaves : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l1 l2 l3 : list (btree A)), one_step f l1 l2 -> one_step f l1 l3 -> same_sum_leaves f l2 l3
build_sind : forall P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp, (forall t : btree A, P [t] t) -> (forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), one_step f l1 l2 -> build l2 t -> P l2 t -> P l1 t) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), build l b -> P l b
build_ind : forall P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop, (forall t : btree A, P [t] t) -> (forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), one_step f l1 l2 -> build l2 t -> P l2 t -> P l1 t) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), build l b -> P l b
same_sum_leaves_length : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), same_sum_leaves f l1 l2 -> length l1 = length l2
cover_min_permutation : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover_min A f l1 t -> permutation l1 l2 -> cover_min A f l2 t
ordered_cover_subst_pred : forall (A : Type) (t1 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), ordered_cover l1 t1 -> length l1 = length l2 -> exists t2 : btree A, subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2
fold_left_permutation : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A), (forall (a : A) (b1 b2 : B), f (f a b1) b2 = f (f a b2) b1) -> forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list B), permutation l1 l2 -> fold_left f l1 a = fold_left f l2 a
prod2list_app : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l1 : list nat) (l2 : list (btree A)) (l3 : list nat) (l4 : list (btree A)), length l1 = length l2 -> prod2list f (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) = prod2list f l1 l2 + prod2list f l3 l4
ordered_cover_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, list (btree A) -> P [t] t) -> (forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> P l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> P l2 t2 -> P (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), ordered_cover l b -> P l b
ordered_cover_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, list (btree A) -> P [t] t) -> (forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> P l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> P l2 t2 -> P (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), ordered_cover l b -> P l b
subst_pred_ordered_cover_l : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> ordered_cover l1 t1
ordered_cover_node : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> ordered_cover (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)
permutation_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation (map f l1) (map f l2)
subst_pred_length : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> length l1 = length l2
cover_node : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3
cover_app : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t1 -> cover l2 t2 -> cover (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)
height_pred_subst_pred : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t1 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l1 t1 -> length l1 = length l2 -> exists t2 : btree A, height_pred n ln l2 t2 /\ subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2
subst_pred_ordered_cover_r : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), subst_pred l1 l2 t1 t2 -> ordered_cover l2 t2
map2_app : forall (A B C : Type) (f : A -> B -> C) (l1 : list A) (l2 : list B) (l3 : list A) (l4 : list B), length l1 = length l2 -> map2 f (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) = map2 f l1 l2 ++ map2 f l3 l4
cover_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, P [t] t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b

```coq
intros l1 l2 t1 t2 H1 H2 H3 H4.
induction H1 using build_ind.
- simpl in *. rewrite <- H3. auto.
- simpl in *. destruct H5 as [l3 [l4 [H5 H6]]].
  assert (weight_tree_list f l3 = weight_tree_list f l4) by (apply one_step_weight_tree_list with (l1 := l1) (l2 := l3); assumption).
  assert (same_sum_leaves f l3 l4) by (apply one_step_same_sum_leaves with (l1 := l1) (l2 := l3); assumption).
  assert (weight_tree_list f l4 = weight_tree_list f l2) by (apply IHbuild; assumption).
  rewrite H7, H8. auto.
Qed.```

original: intros l1 l2 t1 t2 H1 H2 H3 H4. induction H1 using build_ind. - simpl in *. rewrite <- H3. auto. - simpl in *. destruct H5 as [l3 [l4 [H5 H6]]]. assert (weight_tree_list f l3 = weight_tree_list f l4) by (apply one_step_weight_tree_list with (l1 := l1) (l2 := l3); assumption). assert (same_sum_leaves f l3 l4) by (apply one_step_same_sum_leaves with (l1 := l1) (l2 := l3); assumption). assert (weight_tree_list f l4 = weight_tree_list f l2) by (apply IHbuild; assumption). rewrite H7, H8. auto.
